overview: Rebecca Volpetti is a 21 year old student who’s jut finished her studies. Before moving on in her life, she decides to take some off just to relax and think about her future. To do so, she knows she needs to get out of her comfort zone and leave far from home. What about Spain? In spite of her worries and the difficulties she may have to face, Rebecca knows that a long stay abroad will only bring her positive adventures.
title: Rebecca, an Indecent Story
